headline: Kristin Gannon Joins PulteGroup Board As Capital Decisions Take Focus
summary: PulteGroup (NYSE:PHM) has appointed Kristin Gannon as an independent director to its board. Gannon will also serve on the board’s audit and finance and investment committees. She brings investment banking experience focused on real estate M&A and capital markets transactions. PulteGroup, a large U.S. homebuilder, operates at the intersection of housing demand, construction costs, and financing conditions. Investors have been watching homebuilders closely as affordability, mortgage...
